modules:
package test

a.b.c.p = 1
q = 0
a.b.d = 3

p {
  q == 0
  a.b.c.p == 1
  a.b.d == 3
}

package test

a.b[x] = y { x := "c"; y := "d" }

package test
import future.keywords

a.b contains x if some x in [1,2,3]

package test
import future.keywords

a.b[x] = i if some i, x in [1, 2, 3]

package test
import future.keywords

a.b.c.d contains 1 if true
package test.a
import future.keywords

b.c.d contains 2 if true

package test
import future.keywords

q[7] = 8 if true
a[x] if q[x]

package test
import future.keywords

q[7] = 8 if false
a[x] if q[x]

package test
import future.keywords

a.b.c = "d" if true
a.b.e = "f" if true
a.b.g contains x if some x in numbers.range(1, 3)
a.b.h[x] = 1 if x := "one"
